name: Rumble
title: the Mechanized Menace
shortBio: Rumble is a young inventor with a temper. Using nothing more than his own two hands and a heap of scrap, the feisty yordle constructed a colossal mech suit outfitted with an arsenal of electrified harpoons and incendiary rockets. Though others may scoff and sneer at his junkyard creations, Rumble doesn't mind—after all, he's the one with the flamespitter.

skins.name: Bilgerat Rumble
skins.description: When the burdens of invention weigh too heavy on a young yordle's shoulders, there's no better choice than to take to the seas! Nothing like plunderin' and maraudin' to lend Rumble a new lease on life as he terrorizes the coasts.

skins.name: Super Galaxy Rumble
skins.description: Founder of the Super Galaxy Defense Force, Rumble always dreamed of saving the world… with his “explosive face-melters” and “courageous giga-guards”. To this day, his allies still have no idea what those terms mean, but they don't question it—because a yordle operating a volcanic flame-spitting mech can be a very volatile thing.

skins.name: Badlands Baron Rumble
skins.description: Nothing turns a traveler's blood cold like seeing Rumble in the distance, his iron death buggy chugging thick clouds of irradiated smoke. That means someone's got his attention, and those with Rumble's attention have a nasty habit of becoming very, very dead.

skins.name: Space Groove Rumble

chromas.name: Space Groove Rumble

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.name: Space Groove Rumble

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Space Groove event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Space Groove event.

skins.description: The Retro-Futuristic Planet is tired of listening to the boring music brought by Lissandra's evil influence. Fashioning a Groove suit of his own design, Rumble now stomps across his adoptive homeworld, unleashing powerful rockets and a groovy bass track on anyone who'd keep the people from dancing.

skins.name: Cafe Cuties Rumble

chromas.name: Cafe Cuties Rumble

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: As the cafe's handy barista, Rumble always provides piping hot deliciousness! His trusty coffee making suit is unconventional, but effective for any cafe's needs. Just make sure to check the temperature before taking a sip of his drinks—his inventions are known for occasionally going haywire!

passive.name: Junkyard Titan
passive.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, gaining bonus Attack Speed and granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

spells.name: Flamespitter
spells.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Rumble ignites his flamethrower, dealing @FlatDamage@ plus @HealthDamage*100@% max Health magic damage over @FlamespitterDuration@ seconds, reduced to @MinionMod*100@% against minions.

Danger Zone: Damage is increased to @EmpoweredDamage@ plus @EmpoweredHealth@ max Health.

Percent damage is limited to @MonsterCap@ damage on Monsters. @SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Scrap Shield
spells.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Rumble tosses up a barrier, gaining @TotalShield@ Shield for @ShieldDuration.1@ seconds and @MoveSpeed*100@% Move Speed for @MoveSpeedDuration@ second.

Danger Zone: The barrier grants @EmpoweredShield@ Shield and @EmpoweredMS@ Move Speed instead.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Electro Harpoon
spells.description: Rumble launches a harpoon, electrocuting his target with magic damage, slowing their Move Speed, and reducing their Magic Resist. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Rumble launches an electrified harpoon, dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage, Slowing by @BaseSlowAmount@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds, and reducing the enemy's Magic Resist by @PercMagicPen*100@% for @ShredDuration@ seconds.

Hitting an enemy who's already Slowed by this Ability increases the Slow to @EmpoweredSlowAmount@% and reduces the enemy's Magic Resist by @EnhancedMagicPen*100@%

Danger Zone: The harpoon deals @EmpDamage@ magic damage instead and the Slow and reduced Magic Resist are increased by 50%.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: The Equalizer
spells.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Rumble launches a line of rockets, creating a burning trail that Slows by @SlowAmount@% and deals @TotalDamage@ magic damage over @TrailDuration@ seconds.

Rumble can control the direction of the trail by clicking and dragging while casting this Ability.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
